content.html: I know "I hope this message finds you well" is a normal way to start an email, but what about if I am in fact not well? Am I supposed to say thanks but this message didn't find me well??

content.html:
@aaronpk if the person is your friend, then yes üòä

If someone wrote me that not being a close friend, I'd find it shallow. Which, perhaps, was your point?
